long_description: Discover your own powdery paradise with the Burton Paradise snowboard pack. It helps you carry your necessities on backcountry forays where no car or chairlift can reach. Ergonomic, compression-molded back panel, cushy shoulder harness and hipbelt enhance comfort. Convenient panel entry provides access to your gear even when a snowboard is attached. Internal shovel and probe storage keeps gear dry, clean and secure and ready for use at a moment's notice. Straps on the back of the Burton Paradise pack let you carry your board vertically for a secure, balanced load. Includes a hydration sleeve (reservoir sold separately) and fleece-lined goggles pocket.
short_description: Discover your own powdery paradise with the Burton Paradise snowboard pack. It helps you carry your necessities on backcountry forays where no car or chairlift can reach.
